creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Takako and Victor Hauge
description: red sleeveless Jinbaori (surcoat) with floral design on lapels and lining; single button strap in front; cream strips of fabric on shoulders each with two blue and one purple flower design in rope; white circular design at top middle of back
title: Red Surcoat with Floral Design
